CustomField.formula: "&solmgr=1" + "&Id=" + Id + "&QueryId=[QC]{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_CSPARTER_QC},[Opps]{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_CSPARTNER_OPP}, [DQLead]{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_CSPARTNER_DQLEADS}, [Referrals]{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_CSPARTNER_REFERRALS}, [Expired]{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_CSPARTNER_EXPIRED}, [Complete]{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_CSPARNTER_COMPLETE}" + "&TemplateId={!Environment.VAR_CONGA_TEMPLATE_DAILYCS}" + "&CongaEmailTemplateId={!Environment.VAR_CONGA_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_CS_DAILY_REPORT}" + "&EmailAdditionalTo=" + Email__c + "&ofn=" + Name + " " + "Community Solar Update Report" + " " + TEXT(TODAY()) + "&qmode=SendEmail" + "&SC0=1" + "&SC1=Attachments" + "&emailcc=" + Additional_CC_Email__c + "&emailfromid=0D20a000000PBPX"
CustomField.label: Conga Conductor CS Partner Update
